projects.title: Fin-Tech Platform
projects.description: A full-featured Fin-tch platform with microservice architecture, money transfer with currency change, and payment processing. The application provides a seamless banking experience with fast page loads and responsive design.
projects.shortDescription: Modern Fin-tch solution with Springboot and microservice architecture
features: Auth Service : User authentication and authorization
User Service : Users data management, including profile updates and account settings
Transaction Service : Secure and reliable processing of financial transactions and logs
Wallet Service : Digital wallet supporting multiple currencies and transaction history
Gateway & Discovery Service : Dynamic discovery of microservices and Centralized routing
Credit Risk Prediction : ML-based assessment of borrowers for risk analysis

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team workspaces. The app helps teams organize their work, track progress, and meet deadlines efficiently.
projects.shortDescription: Trello-like task management with drag-and-drop functionality

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A weather dashboard that displays current and forecasted weather data for multiple locations. The application uses the OpenWeather API to fetch accurate weather information and presents it in an intuitive interface.
